headline: Travel sector & hotels: Why tariffs will have a 'lower impact'
summary: Hotel stocks are feeling the pressure amid the broader market sell-off from President Trump's tariff policies. Chad Beynon, senior gaming, lodging, and theaters analyst at Macquarie US Equity Research, joins Market Domination Overtime host Josh Lipton to discuss the travel sector in the context of the current economic landscape. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime here.

content.title: Travel sector & hotels: Why tariffs will have a 'lower impact'
content.description:
Hotel stocks are feeling the pressure amid the broader market sell-off from President Trump's tariff policies. Chad Beynon, senior gaming, lodging, and theaters analyst at Macquarie US Equity Research, joins Market Domination Overtime host Josh Lipton to discuss the travel sector in the context of the current economic landscape.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime here.
